item.title: Get Started with Project Bicep
item.description: References Refer to the below links to know more about the project bicep GitHub Repository Docs Examples Tutorials Specifications YouTube Intro to Azure’s Project Bicep with Brendan Burns and team Project Bicep Demo at Ignite 2020 by Mark Russinovich Project Bicep and ARM Templates November 2020 Update Introduction As a first step, we need to install the bicep tools on our local computer.
